title: Bug 114905 - Default value lost in list box of report parameter after modification
description:
Description: When modifying the default value in a list box of a report parameter, the default value is lost.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report that contains a list box report parameter.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Open the report that contains a list box report parameter.
2. Set a default value for the list box parameter.
3. Modify the default value.

Expected behavior: The modified default value should be retained in the list box of the report parameter.
